QuestData.Title: Clawing at the Truth
QuestData.Description: This can't be. My brother was strong-willed, but such vileness... such sickness and violent, bloody evil...$B$B<Tobias brings a hand to his face, averting his gaze.>$B$BI must have answers. I need to know how I got that letter. I need to know if Stalvan really did this.$B$BI need to know why...$B$BTake my ring, $n. Bring it to Madame Eva. That woman is a follower of old arts and makes no secret of it... call it madness, but I'll try anything at this point.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Mistmantle Family Ring to Madame Eva.
QuestData.CompletionText: What dark whispers guide you to my door, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: How interesting. It's been quite a while since I've seen such a ring...
